name: Ganxy Embed
author: Ganxy, Inc.

sections.description:
Official WordPress Plugin to Embed Ganxy products by URL or Embed script.

Allows for easily integration of the Ganxy product embed via the provided Ganxy embed code or via the Ganxy Product URL. Since pasting the embed code into the WordPress editor invalidates the embed trigger script, pasting directly in the editor is not an option. The plugin bridges the gap between the two so you can easily paste your scripts into your page or post without losing the embed functionality.

This plugin creates a shortcode placeholder that can be accessed vial the Visual Editor, clicking the placeholder image (link for an image) or by using the shortcode in the text editor.
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘ganxy embed’
  3. Click Install on the ‘Ganxy Embed’ plugin item.
  4. Activate Ganxy Embed Plugin from installation page or your Plugins page.

From another source

  1. Download ‘Ganxy Embed’ plugin zip file – make note of the download location.
  2. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’ and click ‘Upload’ at the top of the page.
  3. Upload the plugin zip file using the ‘browse’ button and locating it on your local drive.
  4. Activate the ‘Ganxy Embed’ plugin from the install screen or your Plugins page.

After Activation

  1. The plugin will add an icon to the Visual Editor toolbar.
  2. Click the icon to see a list or options.
  3. Select the desired Option (‘Embed by URL’ or ‘Paste Embed Code’).
  4. Follow the direction on the embed page and click OK to add it to the editor.

No FAQs Available at this time.

Installation Instructions

From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘ganxy embed’
  3. Click Install on the ‘Ganxy Embed’ plugin item.
  4. Activate Ganxy Embed Plugin from installation page or your Plugins page.

From another source

  1. Download ‘Ganxy Embed’ plugin zip file – make note of the download location.
  2. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’ and click ‘Upload’ at the top of the page.
  3. Upload the plugin zip file using the ‘browse’ button and locating it on your local drive.
  4. Activate the ‘Ganxy Embed’ plugin from the install screen or your Plugins page.

After Activation

  1. The plugin will add an icon to the Visual Editor toolbar.
  2. Click the icon to see a list or options.
  3. Select the desired Option (‘Embed by URL’ or ‘Paste Embed Code’).
  4. Follow the direction on the embed page and click OK to add it to the editor.
sections.changelog:
1.4.2

  • Update: Update for WordPress 4.9.6+

1.4.1

  • Update: Update for WordPress 4.7.

1.4.0

  • Update: Prep for WordPress Repository submission.
  • Update: Adjust popup styles.

1.3.6

  • Update: Modified editor tinyMCE popup styles.
  • Bug Fix: Fix shortcode function regex.

1.3.5

  • Update: Adjust editor Popup panel to be more responsive.
  • Feature: Add ability to have content in shortcode.
  • Update: Adjusted the Ganxy URL parsing js regex to allow better recognition of URL and parameters.
  • Update: Added IDs to options in tinyMCE popup to eliminate guessing of ID based on location in the form.

1.3.4

  • Update: Modified Option fields in tinyMCE popup.
  • Bug Fix: Bug Fixes.
  • Update: Finished English Translations.

1.3.3

  • Update: Added Help Screen
  • Bug Fix: bug fixes and fine tuned plugin text.

1.3.2

  • Update: Remove ID embed per client request.
  • Update: Add voucher string support to URL embed.
  • Update: Adjust Placeholder images for shortcode.

1.3.1

  • Feature: English Translation setup.

1.3

  • Bug Fix: Bug Fixes.
  • Feature: Add Bundle embed option

1.2

  • Bug Fix: Minor Bug Fixes.

1.1

  • Release: First Testing release

1.0

  • Release: Initial Plugin.
